mapper.select: select DISTINCT c.* from base_courseware_ext a,biz_test_record b,base_exam_signatrue c where a.rel_unit_course_id = b.rel_unit_course_id and c.examid = a.rel_unit_course_id and c.studentid = b.student_id and b.student_id = #{studentId} and a.courseware_id = #{coursewareId} ORDER BY createtime DESC limit 1
